column1: #INFO Action and Category ID are required fields. 1) Set Action to Draft 2) Please find the category ID for your listings here: https://pages.ebay.com/sellerinformation/news/categorychanges.html
#INFO After you've successfully uploaded your draft from the Seller Hub Reports tab, complete your drafts to active listings here: https://www.ebay.com/sh/lst/drafts
